books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A Pulitzer Prize-winning novel set in the Depression-era South and narrated by young Jean Louise Finch, who goes by the nickname Scout.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society, where the government controls every aspect of citizens' lives and independent thought is forbidden.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic novel set in early 19th century England, following the lives of the Bennett family and their relationships with the wealthy Mr. Darcy and his friend Mr. Bingley.
